# DaVinci Resolve Keyboard Shortcuts

## Essential Shortcuts (Edit Page)

### Playback
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `Space` | Play/Pause |
| `J` | Reverse play (press multiple times to speed up) |
| `K` | Stop |
| `L` | Forward play (press multiple times to speed up) |
| `←` `→` | Step one frame |
| `↑` `↓` | Previous/Next edit point |

### Timeline Navigation
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `Home` | Go to start |
| `End` | Go to end |
| `Shift+Z` | Zoom to fit |
| `Cmd/Ctrl + =` | Zoom in |
| `Cmd/Ctrl + -` | Zoom out |

### Editing
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `I` | Mark In |
| `O` | Mark Out |
| `B` | Blade tool (cut) |
| `A` | Selection tool |
| `V` | Overwrite edit |
| `W` | Insert edit |
| `Backspace` | Delete selected |
| `Cmd/Ctrl + Z` | Undo |
| `Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + Z` | Redo |

### Clips
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `Cmd/Ctrl + C` | Copy |
| `Cmd/Ctrl + V` | Paste |
| `Cmd/Ctrl + D` | Disable clip |
| `D` | Duration dialog |
| `R` | Speed change dialog |

## Page Navigation
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `Shift + 2` | Media page |
| `Shift + 3` | Cut page |
| `Shift + 4` | Edit page |
| `Shift + 5` | Fusion page |
| `Shift + 6` | Color page |
| `Shift + 7` | Fairlight page |
| `Shift + 8` | Deliver page |

## Color Page
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `Alt + S` | Add serial node |
| `Alt + P` | Add parallel node |
| `Alt + L` | Add layer node |
| `Cmd/Ctrl + D` | Disable node |
| `Shift + D` | Bypass all grades |
| `Shift + H` | Highlight mode |

## Fusion Page
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `` ` `` | Toggle console |
| `Shift + Space` | Add tool dialog |
| `1` | Show viewer 1 |
| `2` | Show viewer 2 |
| `Ctrl + G` | Group selected |
| `F2` | Rename selected |

## Fairlight (Audio)
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `M` | Toggle mute |
| `S` | Solo track |
| `R` | Record arm |
| `Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + N` | Normalize audio |

## Deliver Page
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + R` | Add to render queue |
| `Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + S` | Start render |
